title: Web-Based Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation learning in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment, with a formative assessment-focused course emphasizing professional practitioners' work application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can complete mathematical problem-solving simulations with over 90% accuracy on a web-based platform
Learners can apply at least three mathematical concepts to present solutions for real-world work scenarios presented in VR environments
Learners can establish self-directed study plans and achieve over 80% formative assessment submission rates

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
